text: Abasya'i amara musake kitaba diyechi ebam tara pare paryayakrame rasulaganake pathiyechi ebam amara mara'iyama-putra ‘isake spasta pramana diyechi [1] ebam ‘ruhula kudusa’ [2] dbara take saktisali karechi. Tabe ki yakhani kono rasula tomadera kache emana kichu eneche ya tomadera manahputa naya takhani tomara ahankara karecha? Atahpara (nabiganera) ekadalera upara mithyaropa karecha ebam ekadalake karecha hatya
